episodes.title: Bayarea Smiles
episodes.descr: Bruce and Kris Jenner celebrate their anniversary. Kim and Tommy Davis buy themselves a stripper pole as a gift, and the youngest Jenner plays on it. Kim appears on The Tyra Banks Show Where she is interviewed about Kim's sex tape. Kourtney deals with relationship drama.

episodes.title: Thompkins Health Clinic
episodes.descr: Kim and Kris, her manager, argue over the management of Kim's appearances and schedule. Meanwhile, Kris hires a nanny, Bree, who is not as appropriate and nanny-decent as she hoped.

episodes.title: Mayo Clinic
episodes.descr: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé go to Mexico for a Girls Gone Wild photo shoot without telling Bruce, afraid that he would disapprove. When he finds out, he leaves his son Brody Jenner to look after Kylie and Kendall while he heads to Mexico to confront them. Unfortunately, leaving Brody with his daughters creates even more chaos.

episodes.title: Microsoft
episodes.descr: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé are about to leave for Las Vegas when Kourtney has a pregnancy scare. Meanwhile, Kendall and Kylie ask their dad for a puppy, which causes a disagreement between their parents.

episodes.title: Google
episodes.descr: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé are about to leave for Las Vegas when Kourtney has a pregnancy scare. Meanwhile, Kendall and Kylie ask their dad for a puppy, which causes a disagreement between their parents.

episodes.title: Amazon
episodes.descr: Kourtney, Kim and Khloé are about to leave for Las Vegas when Kourtney has a pregnancy scare. Meanwhile, Kendall and Kylie ask their dad for a puppy, which causes a disagreement between their parents.

episodes.title: Morgan and Morgan
episodes.descr: Rob gets set up on a date but catches his sisters spying on him. Khloé and Kourtney find out that a homeless man, Shorty, is living behind their store D-A-S-H, and clean up his appearance.

episodes.title: Stanley and Stanley
episodes.descr: Scandalous photos of Kourtney surface, scaring and humiliating Kim, who already feels like she really messed up with her sex tape.

episodes.title: Pearson Hardman
episodes.descr: The family think that Kim is slowly becoming a diva. Kourtney finds shocking texts in Scott's Blackberry.
